description.narrative: IFC''s long-term financing is expected to bring high development impact by enhancing Finca Armenia''s capacity to support productive micro enterprises, resulting in higher growth, employment generation and poverty reduction.

The proposed transaction aims to support FINCA UCO CJSC (Finca Armenia or the Company), a strong microfinance provider in Armenia, through a local currency loan which would facilitate resources for the Companys micro and small entrepreneurs (MSEs) portfolio expansion (the Project). Finca Armenia is a subsidiary of FINCA Microfinance Holding Company, LLC (FMH) a strategic IFC partner who promotes financial inclusion and access to financial services to the underserved, low-income people and communities through its twenty two subsidiaries in Africa, Latin America, Eurasia and the Middle East. The Project would aim to achieve various objectives: (i) provide funding for Finca Armenias MSEs portfolio growth; (ii) reduce foreign exchange and maturity risk by providing long term local currency funding; and (iii) strengthen the relationship with FINCA International and FMH by supporting its subsidiaries.
